signin.title: Nnọọ
signin.subtitle: Banye n'akaụntụ gị
signin.orContinueWith: Ma ọ bụ gaa n'ihu na
signin.termsText: Site na ịbanye, ị na-ekweta na

errors.invalidCredentials: Email ma ọ bụ paswọdụ ezighi ezi
errors.accountLocked: E kpọchiri akaụntụ gị. Kpọtụrụ nkwado.
errors.emailNotVerified: Biko kwado adreesị email gị tupu ịbanye. Lelee igbe akwụkwọ ozi gị maka email nkwado.
errors.backendUnavailable: Sava anyị adịghị arụ ọrụ nwa oge. Nwaa ọzọ n'oge na-adịghị anya.
errors.sessionCreationFailed: Enweghị ike ịbanye ugbu a. Nwaa ọzọ ma ọ bụ jiri email/paswọdụ banye.
errors.tokenExchangeFailed: Ịbanye na Google adaghị. Nwaa iji email/paswọdụ ma ọ bụ kpọtụrụ nkwado.
errors.oauthConfigurationError: Ịbanye Google adịghị arụ ọrụ nwa oge n'ihi nsogbu nhazi. Jiri email/paswọdụ banye.
errors.enterEmailFirst: Biko tinye adreesị email gị mbụ
errors.passwordResetSent: E zigara email nweghachi paswọdụ! Lee igbe akwụkwọ ozi gị.
errors.passwordResetError: Nsogbu na izipu email nweghachi paswọdụ

signup.title: Mepụta akaụntụ gị
signup.subtitle: Malite nnwale efu gị taa
signup.orContinueWith: Ma ọ bụ gaa n'ihu na
signup.termsText: Site na idebanye aha, ị na-ekweta na

errors.emailExists: Akaụntụ nwere email a dị adị
errors.passwordTooShort: Paswọdụ ga-enwerịrị opekata nta mkpụrụ akwụkwọ 8
errors.accountCreated: E mepụtara akaụntụ nke ọma! Lee email gị iji kwado akaụntụ tupu ịbanye.

verificationEmail.sent: E zigara email nkwado! Biko lee igbe akwụkwọ ozi gị.
verificationEmail.error: Nsogbu na izipu email nkwado. Nwaa ọzọ.

forgotPassword.title: Weghachi paswọdụ gị
forgotPassword.subtitle: Tinye email gị, anyị ga-ezigara gị njikọ nweghachi

success.title: Lee email gị
success.message: Anyị zigara njikọ nweghachi paswọdụ na {{email}}

errors.tooManyAttempts: Ọtụtụ mgbalị. Nwaa ọzọ mgbe oge gafere.

success.title: Nweghachi paswọdụ gara nke ọma
success.message: E weghachiri paswọdụ gị. Ugbu a ị nwere ike iji paswọdụ ọhụrụ banye.

errors.tokenInvalid: Njikọ nweghachi a ezighi ezi ma ọ bụ agwụla
errors.passwordTooShort: Paswọdụ ga-enwerịrị opekata nta mkpụrụ akwụkwọ 8

errors.accountExists: Akaụntụ nwere email a dị adị
